node.title: Timeline: The Jonelle Matthews case
node.description: Inside the case against Steven Pankey, a former political candidate who was tried for the kidnapping and murder of a Colorado 12-year-old.
node.content: ["\"48 Hours\" takes you inside the case against Steven Pankey, a former political candidate who was tried for the kidnapping and murder of a Colorado 12-year-old in \"Who Killed Jonelle Matthews?\" airing Saturday, January 8 at 10/9c on CBS and Paramount+.", "In October 2021, a year after former Idaho gubernatorial candidate Steven Pankey was arrested for the kidnapping and murder of 12-year-old Jonelle Matthews, he went to trial.."]
